author: Reuters Editorial
title: Apple supplier Skyworks' revenue rises 15 percent
text:
February 5, 2018 / 9:27 PM / in 5 minutes Apple supplier Skyworks' revenue rises 15 percent Reuters Staff 1 Min Read 
(Reuters) - Apple supplier Skyworks Solutions Inc ( SWKS.O ) reported a 15 percent rise in quarterly revenue on Monday, helped by strong demand for its wireless chips and technology that powers Internet of Things. 
However, net income fell to $70.4 million, or 38 cents per share, for the first quarter ended Dec. 29 from $257.8 million, or $1.38 per share, a year earlier. 
The latest quarter included a provision for income taxes of $315.2 million. 
Revenue rose to $1.05 billion from $914.3 million. Reporting by Shariq Khan in Bengaluru; Editing by Anil D'Silva
